Data Fields
CSL_EpwmAqActionCfg Struct Reference
IP » EPWM

Structure holding the Action Qualifier actions to be taken on the PWM output at the specific events. More...

#include <csl_epwm.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t zeroAction
 
uint32_t prdAction
 
uint32_t cmpAUpAction
 
uint32_t cmpADownAction
 
uint32_t cmpBUpAction
 
uint32_t cmpBDownAction
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding the Action Qualifier actions to be taken on the PWM output at the specific events.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_EpwmAqActionCfg::cmpADownAction

Action to be taken when the counter equals the active CMPA register and the counter is decrementing. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmAqAction_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmAqActionCfg::cmpAUpAction

Action to be taken when the counter equals the active CMPA register and the counter is incrementing. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmAqAction_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmAqActionCfg::cmpBDownAction

Action to be taken when the time-base counter equals the active CMPB register and the counter is decrementing. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmAqAction_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmAqActionCfg::cmpBUpAction

Action to be taken when the counter equals the active CMPB register and the counter is incrementing. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmAqAction_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmAqActionCfg::prdAction

Action to be taken when the counter equals the period. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmAqAction_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmAqActionCfg::zeroAction

Action to be taken when counter equals zero. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmAqAction_t.
